reviews.text: We made reservations for a 6 bed private ensuite in October. I called and emailed them to see if we could be put on a lower floor because we had someone with limited mobility and there is no elevator. They kindly responded that we were written in for the 2nd floor. When we tryed to check in we were on the 3rd floor in a 8 bed ensuite with 2 strangers in the room with us. They would not fix this so we left with a refund on our credit card---paid in cash but they would not give cash back. We booked online and I am sure we will not get our 8 dollar deposit back from the booker. The front desk told us that they cant help it if the booker online has the wrong info on the rooms..and that they dont even have 6 bed rooms. This is unacceptable..they are the ones who contract with the bookers.
reviews.title: THEY GAVE OUR ROOM TO SOMEONE ELSE

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Although this hotel is not in the hussle and bussle of the city of new york, it is in a very pleasant location just a few blocks from Central Park.
reviews.title: Very nice Hotel

reviews.text: The hotel is clean, average sized room (we booked double) with a clean ensuite shower. It was value for money and had a nice roof top where you can sit and enjoy the free internet. However, there is no elevator and about 6floors I think so best to ask for a room on the lower floor is you want to miss out the staircase.
reviews.title: All you really need in NYC
